General.Name: Brookfield Renewable Power Preferred Equity Inc Pref F
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Brookfield Renewable Power Preferred Equity Inc. engages in the electric power generation business. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Toronto, Canada. Brookfield Renewable Power Preferred Equity Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P.
